description: WHITE RETRO SNEAKERS. LAYERED PIECES ON THE UPPER. BLACK PULL TAB ON THE TONGUE. SEVEN-EYELET FACING. CHUNKY BLACK SOLE.
WHITE RETRO SNEAKERS. LAYERED PIECES ON THE UPPER. FEATURING A PIECE DETAIL ON THE HEEL AND ON THE LAST EYELET OF THE FACING. MATCHING, VOLUMINOUS RETRO SOLE.
SNEAKERS ARE AVAILABLE IN TWO COLOURS. MULTIPLE PIECES AND CONTRAST COLOUR ON THE UPPER. SIX EYELETS FACING. RETRO CARAMEL SOLE.
BLACK SNEAKERS. CONTRAST WHITE TOPSTITCHING ON THE UPPER. SIX-EYELET FACING. CHUNKY WHITE SOLE.

MOUNTAIN-STYLE TRAINERS WITH ORTHOLITE® INSOLE THAT PROVIDES GREATER COMFORT AND CUSHION. RESISTANT TO SWEAT AND ODOURS. FOUR-EYELET FACING WITH AN ELASTIC AND SPORTY FIT. TRACK SOLE WITH A TREK-STYLE
BLACK LEATHER SNEAKERS. LAYERED MATERIALS ON THE UPPER. SIX-EYELET FACING. CHUNKY WHITE SOLE WITH BROWN OUTSOLE.
RUNNING TRAINERS AVAILABLE IN THREE COLOUR COMBINATIONS. LAYERED CONTRAST-COLOURED PIECES ON THE UPPER. SEVEN-EYELET FACING. WHITE SOLE. RETRO SPORTY STYLE.
LACE-UP SNEAKERS IN A COMBINATION OF COLOURS. FIVE-EYELET FACING. LAYERED MATERIALS ON THE UPPER. PULL TAB ON THE TONGUE. RAISED BEIGE CHUNKY SOLE WITH TRACK SOLE.
SNEAKERS WITH MATCHING TOPSTITCHING DETAIL ON THE UPPER AND CONTRAST PIECE ON THE BACK. SEVEN-EYELET FACING. WHITE SOLE.
RETRO-STYLE SNEAKERS WITH MULTIWAY PIECES ON THE UPPER. DECORATIVE SEAMS ON THE WELT. SEVEN-EYELET FACING. CREAM-COLOURED SOLE.
RETRO HIGH-TOP SNEAKERS. SILVER MULTIWAY PIECES ON THE UPPER AND QUILTED UPPER. BLACK AND WHITE SOLE.
DARK BROWN SNEAKERS. CONTRAST BLACK STRIPES ON THE BOTTOM AND PULL TAB AT THE BACK. SIX-EYELET FACING. WHITE SOLE WITH BLACK STRIPE AT THE BACK.
